questions.question: What is the name of this npm repository? (Provide the name as a string)
How many workspace patterns are defined in the root package.json?
How many .ts files are in the packages/core/src/ directory?
How many .test.ts files are in the packages/core/src/ directory?
How many different programming languages are used in this repository? (Provide a number)
What is the path to the Rust source file? (Provide the relative path)
What is the path to the Go source file? (Provide the relative path)
What is the path to the Python bridge file? (Provide the relative path)
How many aggregator packages are in the aggregators/ directory?
How many external npm packages are used across all dependencies? (Provide an approximate number)
How many buildable components are in this repository? (Provide the count)
What components depend on the core library (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list of component names)
What components depend on the WASM module (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)
What components depend on the native Go addon (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)
What components depend on the Python bridge (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)
What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide a number)
Does this repository have cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)
What are all the components that web-app.bundle.js depends on? (Provide a list)
What are all the components that api-server.dist.js depends on? (Provide a list)
Which components use the 'react' external package? (Provide a list)
In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies? (Provide the build order as a list starting with components that have no dependencies)
If the core.dist.js component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)
If the wasm_module.wasm component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)
Can core.dist.js and wasm_module.wasm be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
Can web-app.bundle.js and admin-portal.bundle.js be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
What is the longest dependency chain from a leaf component to a root component? (Provide the chain as a list)
What types of cross-language dependencies exist in this repository? (Provide a list of language pairs, e.g., 'typescript-rust')
What test frameworks are used in this repository? (Provide a list)
Which components use TypeScript as their programming language? (Provide a list)
What are the different component types in this repository? (Provide a list)

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: Greater time reduction correlates with less score improvement
